Offering a 1,471 seat theater, in-house box office, a 10,000 square foot museum, on-site catering, an elegant lobby, a fully-equipped dance studio, a variety of meeting rooms, courtyard, and lakeside terrace... we have everything you need for any special private or corporate event. See Our Spaces Get a behind-the-scenes look at our various rental spaces. More Info Technical Specifications The Center's world class stage provides a platform for the community and national acts alike. More Info Event Form Interested in hosting your event here? Our Events Coordinator is here to guide you every step of the way. More Info Sponsorship and Advertising Opportunities Become a sponsor at The Center! Google Tag Manager (noscript) End Google Tag Manager (noscript) [Skip to Content] Coral Springs Center For The Arts Close Mobile nav Events & Tickets Buy Tickets Upcoming Events Where to Buy Tickets Seating Charts Education Next Stop Broadway Invision Theatre Company's 25/26 Season Subscription Close Mobile nav Plan Your Visit First Time Guests Local Cuisine & Hotels Getting Here Concessions Close Mobile nav Guest Services Group Services Accessibility Info Close Mobile nav Book Your Event Meetings and Special Events Technical Specifications Event Form Sponsorship and Advertising Opportunities Close Mobile nav About Us Management Team Contact Us Usher Volunteering Close Mobile nav Subscribe proud home of Next Stop Broadway Link and Logo proud home of Next Stop Broadway Link and Logo About Us The Center’s Mission is to “create a welcoming, professional environment for entertainment, events, education, and culture that offers the community a positive and rewarding experience.” Located in Coral Springs, Florida, The Center delivers a modern fusion of the finest in music, dance, comedy and more! With events including galleries, dynamic shows, concerts, and festivals, there are plenty of entertainment options suited for all ages and interests. From the best of Broadway, top comedians, and performances of every genre, to a diverse selection of family productions, the theater has something for every taste. Over the last 27 years, The Center has debuted Broadway shows including Rent and Fiddler on the Roof and has hosted celebrity shows such as Howie Mandel and Dave Chappelle. In addition to the theater, The Center is home to a fully equipped dance studio and various meeting rooms for corporate and private events, as well as the Coral Springs Museum of Art . The museum offers a diverse visual experience, featuring a permanent collection while still introducing new exhibits every three months. The Center has come a long way since its original designation as a municipal auditorium and a gymnasium in 1990, undergoing a 4 million dollar renovation in 1996. This remodel created a completely transformed first-class performing and visual arts venue, complete with a 1471-seat theatre with a fully enclosed balcony and a campus spanning 38,000 sq. feet. The Center has become a unique haven for lovers of the arts, serving as a cultural hub for approximately 200,000 visitors annually, drawing audiences from North Broward and South Palm Beach Counties preferring an intimate theater experience and museum visit closer to home. Management Team The Center's senior staff aims to produce world class entertainment and wholly professional experience. More Info Get Involved Find your place at The Center! More Info Contact Us Please contact us if you have any questions or comments you would like to share with The Center. More Info Spotlight On The Center Coming Soon! Our newsletter to keep you in the know. Let us know how we can help you create a memorable experience for you and your guests. For additional information regarding our spaces: please use the contact us form or give us a call at 954-344-5993 and connect with us. The Banquet Room Newly renovated, the banquet room offers the perfect space for large parties and events. This spacious room is perfect for your next birthday party, gathering, business meeting or educational seminar to new a few! Host your next event in our most popular space! The Dance Studio With a beautiful view of the courtyard, our dance studio makes a great space for a rehearsal, private parties, and meetings. Level 3 Lounge The Level 3 Lounge is The Center’s most exclusive space. With our expertly crafted relaxing atmosphere, this lounge features a built-in bar and luxurious furniture. Treat your guests to an elevated experience. Host your next event here! The Lobby A spacious lobby with newly renovated concessions stands perfect for conventions, trade shows or expos. The Courtyard A beautiful space for weddings, receptions, and outdoor events. With our luminous café lights strung around the trees, you & your guests will enjoy the captivating allure of South Florida as your décor. This outdoor space will create the perfect ambiance for your next special event. The Theatre The Center’s world-class stage provides a platform for the community and national acts alike. Our theatre features state-of-the-art equipment and an intimate theater experience for you and your guests.
